img.alt: Students take advantage of Alternate seating at CMS

div.div: Welcome to the Corinth School District website! We believe that communication between all school stakeholders is key to student success and improved schools. This new website is designed to provide parents and community members with all the information needed to be more informed about educational opportunities provided by our District. You will find the site works just as well on mobile devices as it does on a desktop so you can find information on the go. We are continuing to build the website so look forward to new content being added on a regular basis. Please let us know what you would like to see as a part of this website.

The Mission of the Corinth School District is to create a world-class 21st century educational experience for all students to achieve academic success, develop personal and civic responsibility, and achieve career and college readiness for the future.
Vision
As a courageous, innovative leader in education, the Corinth School District will become one of the nation's top performing school districts through providing a world-class, 21st century educational experience graduating all students with the college and career readiness skills needed to succeed in a global knowledge based society.
